com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client

Class VerificationInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.fd.signatures.pki.client.VerificationInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class VerificationInfo
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Lists the Certificate Information generated out of validating a certificate. It includes Path Validation certificates and their revocation information.
    See Also:
